Monsters With 2 Different Pictures
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Monsters With 2 Different Pictures
By qolf on Tuesday, May 14, 2013 - 06:03 pm:

I'm sure other people have noticed, but some
monsters have different pics on their cards, and
there battling portrait.
Right now the ones i can think of are
Wood Saurian
Shell Saurian
Trident
I know there are more, just can't think of them
right now. Usually the battling portrait is just a
zoomed and centered on the face version of their
card pic, But for these the monsters are facing a
different direction and are in a different
position.
Anyone wanna list some others?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, May 14, 2013 - 06:31 pm:

Pure plant?
